title: Solomon Lamescus

properties.name: description
properties.value: Solomon Lamescus is a vampyre noble partially responsible for managing the Sanguinesti region. A prominent member of House Drakan, Solomon appeared in the 19th Postbag from the Hedge on behalf of Lord Lowerniel Vergidiyad Drakan.[1] He appears to be rather civil, and without intense cruelty (at least by vampyre standards), as he writes in a professional, while biased, manner.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Solomon Lamescus
 This article contains information only featured in Postbag from the Hedge.
Postbags released during the RuneScape 2 era (2005-07) are generally not considered canon, unless otherwise mentioned. Postbags released during the Old School era (since 2021) are generally considered canon.

Solomon Lamescus is a vampyre noble partially responsible for managing the Sanguinesti region. A prominent member of House Drakan, Solomon appeared in the 19th Postbag from the Hedge on behalf of Lord Lowerniel Vergidiyad Drakan.[1] He appears to be rather civil, and without intense cruelty (at least by vampyre standards), as he writes in a professional, while biased, manner.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Postbag 19 - "Transcript:The vampyres explain themselves", Letter 4, by Solomon Lamescus. RuneScape Postbags from the Hedge.
